com.saucelabs.saucerest

Class SauceREST

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saucelabs.saucerest.SauceREST
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SauceREST
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Simple Java API that invokes the Sauce REST API. The full list of the Sauce REST API functionality is available from https://docs.saucelabs.com/reference/rest-api.
    Author:
    Ross Rowe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String accessKey
      The access key to use when performing HTTP requests to the Sauce REST API.

      The username to use when performing HTTP requests to the Sauce REST API.

      • downloadVideo

        public void downloadVideo(String jobId,
                          String location)
        Downloads the video for a Sauce Job to the filesystem. The file will be stored in a directory specified by the location field.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the Sauce Job Id, typically equal to the Selenium/WebDriver sessionId
        location - represents the base directory where the video should be downloaded to

      • downloadLog

        public void downloadLog(String jobId,
                        String location)
        Downloads the log file for a Sauce Job to the filesystem. The file will be stored in a directory specified by the location field.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the Sauce Job Id, typically equal to the Selenium/WebDriver sessionId
        location - represents the base directory where the video should be downloaded to

        HTTP response contents

      • updateJobInfo

        public void updateJobInfo(String jobId,
                          Map<String,Object> updates)
        Invokes the Sauce REST API to update the details of a Sauce job, using the details included in the updates parameter.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the Sauce job id to update
        updates - Map of attributes to update

      • uploadFile

        public String uploadFile(File file)
                  throws IOException
        Uploads a file to Sauce storage.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to upload -param fileName uses file.getName() to store in sauce -param overwrite set to true
        Returns:
        the md5 hash returned by sauce of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - can be thrown when server returns an error (tcp or http status not in the 200 range)

      • uploadFile

        public String uploadFile(File file,
                         String fileName)
                  throws IOException
        Uploads a file to Sauce storage.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to upload
        fileName - name of the file in sauce storage -param overwrite set to true
        Returns:
        the md5 hash returned by sauce of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - can be thrown when server returns an error (tcp or http status not in the 200 range)

      • uploadFile

        public String uploadFile(File file,
                         String fileName,
                         Boolean overwrite)
                  throws IOException
        Uploads a file to Sauce storage.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to upload
        fileName - name of the file in sauce storage
        overwrite - boolean flag to overwrite file in sauce storage if it exists
        Returns:
        the md5 hash returned by sauce of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - can be thrown when server returns an error (tcp or http status not in the 200 range)

      • uploadFile

        public String uploadFile(InputStream is,
                         String fileName,
                         Boolean overwrite)
                  throws IOException
        Uploads a file to Sauce storage.
        Parameters:
        is - Input stream of the file to be uploaded
        fileName - name of the file in sauce storage
        overwrite - boolean flag to overwrite file in sauce storage if it exists
        Returns:
        the md5 hash returned by sauce of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - can be thrown when server returns an error (tcp or http status not in the 200 range)

      • getPublicJobLink

        public String getPublicJobLink(String jobId)
        Generates a link to the job page on Saucelabs.com, which can be accessed without the user's credentials. Auth token is HMAC/MD5 of the job ID with the key <username>:<api key> (see http://saucelabs.com/docs/integration#public-job-links).
        Parameters:
        jobId - the Sauce Job Id, typically equal to the Selenium/WebDriver sessionId
        Returns:
        link to the job page with authorization token

      • encodeAuthentication

        protected String encodeAuthentication()
        Returns:
        base64 encoded String representing the username/access key

      • deleteTunnel

        public void deleteTunnel(String tunnelId)
        Invokes the Sauce REST API to delete a tunnel.
        Parameters:
        tunnelId - Identifier of the tunnel to delete

      • getTunnels

        public String getTunnels()
        Invokes the Sauce REST API to retrieve the details of the tunnels currently associated with the user.
        Returns:
        String (in JSON format) representing the tunnel information

      • getTunnelInformation

        public String getTunnelInformation(String tunnelId)
        Invokes the Sauce REST API to retrieve the details of the tunnel.
        Parameters:
        tunnelId - the Sauce Tunnel id
        Returns:
        String (in JSON format) representing the tunnel information

      • getSupportedPlatforms

        public String getSupportedPlatforms(String automationApi)
        Returns a String (in JSON format) representing the list of objects describing all the OS and browser platforms currently supported on Sauce Labs. (see https://docs.saucelabs.com/reference/rest-api/#get-supported-platforms).
        Parameters:
        automationApi - the automation API name
        Returns:
        String (in JSON format) representing the supported platforms information

                               int limit)
        Retrieve jobs associated with a build
        Parameters:
        build - Build Id
        limit - Max jobs to return
        Returns:
        String (in JSON format) representing jobs associated with a build

      • recordCI

        public boolean recordCI(String platform,
                        String platformVersion)
        Record CI Usage to Sauce Labs
        Parameters:
        platform - Platform string. Such as "jenkins", "bamboo", "teamcity"
        platformVersion - Version string. Such as "1.1.1"
        Returns:
        if it was a success or not
